channel.title: Critical Role: campaign 2
channel.description: A bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors[tm] playing TTRPGs
channel.copyright: Copyright 2021 Geek and Sundry and/or Critical Role.

item.title: The Mighty Nein Reunited Part 2 | Uk'otoa Unleashed
item.description:
The reunion isn't over yet! Picking up several months after the events in Cognouza, our unsung heroes have all started new chapters in their lives. However, when some discover that there are still old chapters yet to be closed, The Mighty Nein must reunite for more stories untold…
Due to the improv nature of Critical Role and other RPG content on our channels, some themes and situations that occur in-game may be difficult for some to handle. If certain episodes or scenes become uncomfortable, we strongly suggest taking a break or skipping that particular episode. Your health and well-being is important to us and Psycom has a great list of international mental health resources, in case it’s useful: http://bit.ly/PsycomResources
Twitch subscribers gain instant access to VODs of our shows like Critical Role, Exandria Unlimited, and 4-Sided Dive. But don't worry: Twitch broadcasts will be uploaded to YouTube about 36 hours after airing live, with audio-only podcast versions of select shows on Spotify, Apple Podcasts & Google Podcasts following a week after the initial air date. Twitch subscribers also gain access to our official custom emote set and subscriber badges and the ability to post links in Twitch chat!
Character Art and Thumbnail by Ariana Orner: https://twitter.com/ornerine
Mighty Nein Opening Title animated by Kamille Areopagita and Kevin Areopagita
“Your Turn To Roll (Critical Role Theme)” Written by Sam Riegel and Jason Charles Miller Original Music by Omar Fadel and Hexany Audio "Welcome to Wildemount” Art reel theme by Colm McGuinness Additional Music by Universal Production Music, Epidemic Sounds, and 5 Alarm
item.author: music@critrole.com (Matthew Mercer, Marisha Ray, Travis Willingham, Laura Bailey, Liam O'Brien, Sam Riegel, Ashley Johnson, Taliesin Jaffe)

item.title: Critical Role Campaign 2 Wrap Up

item.title: C2E19 The Gentleman‘s Path
item.description: The Mighty Nein find themselves facing multiple choices as to their next actions and alliances…

item.title: C2E18 Whispers of War
item.description: The end of the Harvest Close Festival brings a victory overshadowed by the bigger problems of the Empire...

item.title: C2E17 Harvest Close
item.description: The Mighty Nein attend the Harvest Close Festival, taking part in sweets and games of skill, and entering the challenging Victory Pit...

item.title: C2E16 A Favor In Kind
item.description: The Mighty Nein deal with the ramifications of their actions in the research facility, exploring more of the dark caverns beneath Zadash and experimenting with dangerous unknowns…

item.title: C2E15 Where The River Goes
item.description: Heading down an underground river, the Mighty Nein explore a long abandoned research facility, uncovering dangerous foes and even more dangerous secrets...

item.title: C2E14 Fleeting Memories
item.description: The Mighty Nein find themselves creating dangerous allegiances, and uncovering more about the past of one of their own…

item.title: C2E13 Lost & Found
item.description: The Mighty Nein deal with the fallout from the night’s events, working to repair the fraying edges of the Knights of Requital and learning how to trust their own team…

item.title: C2E12 Midnight Espionage
item.description: Hijinks ensue as the Mighty Nein attempt subterfuge in order to carry out the mission of the Knights of Requital...

item.title: C2E11 Zemnian Nights
item.description: The Mighty Nein finally make it into the Tri-Spire, exploring the upper echelon of Zadash and investigating the Knights of Requital’s claims of corruption within the government...

item.title: C2E10 Waste and Webs
item.description: The Mighty Nein delve into the sewers of Zadash in search of the mysterious beast that has been terrorizing the Crownsguard.

item.title: C2E9 Steam and Conversation
item.description: The Mighty Nein explore Zadash, looking for new jobs, finding old allies, and stumbling upon intriguing mysteries...

item.title: C2E8 The Gates of Zadash
item.description: The group decides upon a name and leaves Alfield, heading back on the open road to Zadash... though not without having to deal with the dangers of the road.

item.title: C2E7 Hush
item.description: The group plunges deeper into the gnoll mines, coming across an unexpected ally, and wandering into a nest of dangers...(guest Khary Payton)

item.title: C2E6 The Howling Mines
item.description: The group questions the crownsguard for clarity about last night’s attacks, and their hunt for the gnolls leads them to a descent down a mysterious mine…

item.title: C2E5 The Open Road
item.description: The group hits the road, preparing for a long trip to Zidash. But trouble in the small town of Alfield stops the band of adventurers in their tracks…

item.title: C2E4 Disparate Pieces
item.description: The party presents evidence of the devil toad’s corruption at a midnight trial, and Beau confronts an envoy from her past...

item.title: C2E3 The Midnight Chase
item.description: The party searches for the devil toad in an attempt to clear their name, finding themselves on a haunted island in the middle of the Usteloch...

item.title: C2E2 A Show of Scrutiny
item.description: The newly formed party delves into their own investigation of the events at the carnival, while still wondering if they can trust the company they've found themselves in...

item.title: C2E1 Curious Beginnings
item.description: In Wildemount, seven adventurers coalesce in a tavern before finding themselves drawn to a mysterious circus...
